name: Summarization - Extended Conversation
description: Test summarization preserves key information from long conversation
inputs: I want to evaluate my photography skills
Add criteria for composition, lighting, and post-processing
For composition I follow the rule of thirds religiously. I also use leading lines and framing techniques.
I shoot mostly in golden hour. I understand the inverse square law for artificial lighting.
I use Lightroom for 90% of my edits. My workflow includes culling in Photo Mechanic first.
I've been shooting for 8 years now. Started with a Canon Rebel, now use a Sony A7IV.
My favorite genres are street photography and landscapes. I've sold prints at local galleries.
I teach a beginner workshop once a month at the community center.
Recently got into drone photography. Passed my Part 107 exam last year.
